request.name: watch
request.description: Monitor the wallpaper color of a given screen.

request.name: unwatch
request.description: Stop monitor the wallpaper color for the given screen.

request.name: destroy
request.description: The client no longer cares about wallpaper_color.

event.name: output_color
event.description: Tell the client that the wallpaper color of the screen it is monitoring has changed. This event will also be sent immediately when the client requests a watch.
